content:
**the turtle is almost at the end of the page if you do a page search for tiny striped turtle you can jump right to it ** also available at this link https //kristieskids weebly com/patterns1/post-title-click-and-type-to-edit a copy of this pattern is also available on the crochetville forum 1 supplies needed
small amounts of worsted-weight yarn
stitch marker or safety pin
buttons for eyes optional
fiberfill 1 https //forum crochetville com/topic/40998-tiny-striped-turtle/#comment-581345
